description: This file provides ambient type declarations for WebSocket utility functions used in the frontend of a surgical schedule management system. It exports functions for connecting, subscribing to messages and status changes, and sending messages over WebSocket.

methods.name: onMessage
methods.description: Subscribes to incoming WebSocket messages. Returns an unsubscribe function.

methods.name: onStatus
methods.description: Subscribes to WebSocket connection status changes. Returns an unsubscribe function.

methods.name: send
methods.description: Sends a JSON-serializable message over the WebSocket if the connection is open.
